_sText:
My first surf Map.

Development of this started about ~5 years ago, but then I forgot about it after a few months...

Now I have taken the time to make something of it.

It consists of 3 stages and 2 bonuses. Difficulty wise i feel that it is somewhere between Tier2 and Tier3. The bonuses are ~Tier4

Evo Update (Thanks to feedback from Granis):
* Use Landmark Angles on trigger_teleports
* Teleporters on the bonuses no longer allow the players to keep their speed
* Adapted the surf angle on ramps where the layout allowed it without destroying the original feeling of the map (might lower difficulty slightly)
* Optimized skybox and void facing textures
* Changed Bonus2 to ordinary gravity (might increase difficulty slightly)
* Players no longer take fall damage

Evo2 Update
* Re-worked the map visually, using different textures for over- and underground areas
* Improved lighting
* Improved player experience for some teleporters
* Removed annoying sounds
* Improved the surf a little bit
* Added bonus3
* Added Counter-Strike:Source version

The Evo2 update is hopefully the last change I make to this map.

It should feel better to play now, as well as also being available for CSS.

Being my first map, I learned from this as much as I could and I am now looking forward to bigger and better Projects :)

CSGO Version: https://gamebanana.com/maps/209033
